newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak state bond issue placed in advance at banks.
newsitem.headline: Slovak state bond issue placed in advance at banks.

text.p: A two-year, one billion crown tranche of Slovak state bonds has been placed in advance in two of the country's building societies, a construction ministry official said on Wednesday.
"According to an agreement, Prva Stavebna Sporitelna and the VUB Wustenrot will buy the entire issue," Dagmar Belakova of the Construction Ministry told Reuters.
